import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from './Rating'; function Product() { const { id } = useParams() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails); const { loading, error, product } = productDetails; return <> { loading?( ): error?( {error} ):(

) } } export default Product
